pinyin: He2 fei2 Gong1 ye4 Da4 xue2

definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Hefei University of Technology has established a complete experimental system of distributed generations.
sentences.chinese: 合肥工業大學較早建立了完備的分佈式發電實驗系統。
